artist: Artist: Nigel Auchterlounie; Publisher: Slab-O-Concrete, Hove, U.K.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Folded leaf, photomechanical illustration of an anthropomorphic pig and bunny, with text and designs, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper; 1 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; single, folded leaf
title: Bunny Girl and Pig Boy in Bliss? [Missive Device]
